languages.text: "Так точно. А когда спина заживет — я повторю это наказание столько раз, сколько фальшивых Немезитов было на моей памяти".

traits.locale_text: "Так точно. А когда спина заживет — я повторю это наказание столько раз, сколько фальшивых Немезитов было на моей памяти".

languages.text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."
languages.original_text: "Так точно. А когда спина заживет — я повторю это наказание столько раз, сколько фальшивых Немезитов было на моей памяти".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."
"Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."
"Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

"Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."
"Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et dès que mon dos sera guéri, je me flagellerai à nouveau pour tous les prétendus Némésite qui ont sévi à notre bord selon mes estimations. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et dès que mon dos sera guéri, je me flagellerai à nouveau pour tous les prétendus Némésite qui ont sévi à notre bord selon mes estimations. »

languages.text: «Así lo haré, Lord Capitán. Y tan pronto como se sane mi espalda, repetiré el castigo por cada Nemesitio que ha surgido estando yo al cargo».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

traits.locale_text: «Así lo haré, Lord Capitán. Y tan pronto como se sane mi espalda, repetiré el castigo por cada Nemesitio que ha surgido estando yo al cargo».

languages.text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン。私の背中の痛みが治り次第、この罰を、全てのネメサイトと呼ばれる者達に繰り返します」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン。私の背中の痛みが治り次第、この罰を、全てのネメサイトと呼ばれる者達に繰り返します」

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。等我背上的伤好了之后，我会继续接受责罚。我们每揪出过一个涅墨斯特，我就接受一遍责罚。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。等我背上的伤好了之后，我会继续接受责罚。我们每揪出过一个涅墨斯特，我就接受一遍责罚。”

languages.text: "Ja, Lord Captain. Und sobald mein Rücken verheilt ist, werde ich diese Bestrafung für jeden sogenannten Nemesit wiederholen, den es nach meiner Zählung gab."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Lord Captain. Und sobald mein Rücken verheilt ist, werde ich diese Bestrafung für jeden sogenannten Nemesit wiederholen, den es nach meiner Zählung gab."

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Sırtım iyileşir iyileşmez hesabıma göre elimizde bulunan her bir sözüm ona Nemezit için bu cezayı tekrarlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. And as soon as my back has healed, I will repeat this punishment once for every so-called Nemesite we've had by my count."
